page.title: 08Peterlee's Social Problems.
page.content:
{Vandals in Peterlee}break into shops, schools and houses. They break in just because they think that they are clever.
Sometimes, when they break into the shops they steal things but at other times they just smash things up. They throw bricks at doors and windows. Sometimes they kick the doors down.
In{Peterlee}there is quite a lot of {graffiti}on walls. When people write on walls they are just showing off.
Some of the{dogs in Peterlee}are not looked after properly. They are just left to roam about the steets, sometimes in packs, and use the pavements as their toilet.
